tool_description:
Simplified and Traditional Chinese sentiment analysis API.
免费试用简体中文和繁体中文情感分析API
name: FuxiAPI
title: FuxiAPI

api_list.name: /sentiment
api_list.description: Main endpoint accepting texts in Chinese and returning the sentimentTag and sentimentStrength values.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dmitrykey-fuxiapi-v1.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dmitrykey-fuxiapi-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dmitrykey-fuxiapi-v1.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dmitrykey-fuxiapi-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
